Subject: Service account passwords
Description:
We have a mandate to change service account passwords to 25 char and need these questions answered.

Does your application (Code / Design / User Interface) currently satisfy the requirement of a minimum of 25+ character password LENGTH for the Service IDs at login.

Does your application (Code / Design / User Interface) currently satisfy the COMPLEXITY (MIXED-CASE) requirement. 

Does your application (Code / Design / User Interface) currently satisfy the SPECIAL CHARACTER requirement by allowing below special characters to be used in the password?

*Requirement: SPECIAL CHARACTER

('-!"#$%&()*,./:;?@[]^_`{|}~+)
What_We_Know__c: The customer has a question regarding the service account's password complexity.
Solution_Comment__c: We have no issue with the complexity of the password. It's up to you to set it up the way you want it based on your Windows/AD requirements
